documentation.description: Returns information about the tasks currently executing on one or more nodes in the cluster.

format.description: a short version of the Accept header, e.g. json, yaml

node_id.description: A comma-separated list of node IDs or names to limit the returned information; use `_local` to return information from the node you're connecting to, leave empty to get information from all nodes

actions.description: A comma-separated list of actions that should be returned. Leave empty to return all.

parent_task.description: Return tasks with specified parent task id. Set to -1 to return all.

h.description: Comma-separated list of column names to display

s.description: Comma-separated list of column names or column aliases to sort by

time.description: The unit in which to display time values
